title: BBC Local Live: Derbyshire on Tuesday 6 December 2016 - BBC News
summary: mackworth death : man arrested on sus of murder .
twitchers flock to see rare bird in derbyshire .
dovedale 's famous stepping stones out of action .
christmas market criticised for using reindeer .
rams to face west brom in fa cup .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's all from derbyshire local live today but we 'll be back tomorrow from 08:00 with your news , travel , sport and weather .

documents.title: weather : cloudy night with fog patches
text: another cloudy night with fog patches persisting so extra care needed on the roads .
some drizzly rain moving through the first part of the night .
staying cloudy with some fog patches and lows of 6c ( 43f ) .
author: Lucy Martin
BBC Weather

documents.title: latest headlines for derbyshire
text: latest headlines for derbyshire
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: arrests after drugs found at house
text: two women and a man have been arrested after cannabis and morphine were found during a raid at a house in chaddesden this morning .
derbyshire police said the search was prompted by `` intelligence received from the community '' .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: thousands oppose library 's closure
text: a petition against the closure of derby 's central library has gathered almost 3,000 signatures in three weeks .
the idea is to close and move the facility to the council house as part of a £ 2.5m redevelopment of its ground floor .
what do you think to this potential development ?
drop me a email here to tell us your views .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: railway plans 'not fresh privatisation '
text: the government is denying its plans to overhaul the railways amount to privatisation .
ministers want network rail , which is publicly owned , to share responsibility for running the tracks with the private train-operating companies .
the east midlands franchise is expected to be one of the first to take part when it 's up for renewal .
author: Lisa Teanby
Newsreader, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: cromford canal clean-up done for today
text: the oil cleanup on the # cromford # canal has now finished for today .
many thanks to all at @ twitterid for all their assistance # teamwork
any idea where it came from ?
we have been unable to identify the source of the oil .
it is possible that a unknown fuel spillage on the a6 could be responsible
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: family 's anger at holiday illness nightmare
text: a family who became so ill on holiday one of their baby children ended up in hospital are taking legal action .
author: Derbyshire Times

documents.title: can the rams keep winning ?
text: how much longer can derby county keep their winning run going ?
here are their next few fixtures .

documents.title: dusky thrush draws birdwatchers to derbyshire
text: nick brown , from derbyshire wildlife trust , has been talking about the dusky thrush that 's exciting birdwatchers in beeley .
he said : `` normally migration is in october and finishes in november , so this bird has probably been here for a while .
`` the bird breeds in siberia and they look like a redwing .
it is about the size of a blackbird .
`` it tends to eat berries .
once the berries dry up it 'll probably just disappear after a while .
it may try to go south as it has this instinct to go south in the autumn . ''
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: school takes action over 'extreme ' haircut
text: a derby mum says she feels angry after her son 's school sent her a letter telling her that her son 's haircut was 'extreme ' .
author: Derby Telegraph

text: you might need to find another route
lowes lane , swarkestone remains closed for safety reasons .
@ twitterid which buffoon has gone through that wall ? !
author: Khia Lewis-Todd

text: what a misty morning at chatsworth house .
thank you to michael hardy for sending us in this beautiful photo .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: man attacked by trio after leaving club
text: a man suffered serious facial injuries when he was attacked by three men shortly after leaving the association nightclub in ripley .
police are appealing for witnesses to the assault , which happened in church street on 23 october .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : determined jogger takes on dovedale 's displaced stepping stones
text: walkers in dovedale have been asked to avoid using the stepping stones but to use the bridge instead .
one determined jogger decided to take on the impassable stepping stones .
will they make it ?
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: ufo 'caught on camera '
text: a video has emerged online of 'diamond shaped ufos ' in derbyshire .
author: Belper News

documents.title: your photos : night time intruder in belper
text: a nosey intruder was caught on camera in a garden in belper .
thank you to lindafrombelper for sending us your night cam discovery .
if you have any snaps send them in here .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: mackworth death : family 'totally devastated '
text: mr seggie 's family has released a statement following the father-of-two 's death .
it said : everyone loved him , he always had a smile on his face and was always there supporting his family .
`` he was our best friend and our hero , and now we do n't have him .
we are totally devastated and will miss him greatly .
we just want him to walk back through the door . ''
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakingmackworth death : man arrested
text: a 31-year-old man has been arrested on sus of the murder of a man who was found dead in mackworth .
geoff seggie , 59 , was found at a house in marylebone crescent on thursday .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: volunteers chip in to help clear cromford canal
text: as we told you this morning the clean-up of an oil spillage will begin today at cromford canal .
volunteers from derbyshire wildlife trust will be working alongside the environment agency .
it 's not clear where the oil , which was discovered on thursday , came from , and the wildlife trust 's angela mason told us it would n't be an easy job to clear it up .
author: Sally Swinfen
BBC Radio Derby newsreader

documents.title: listen : under-fire christmas market organiser
text: carol pringle , who 's organised the christmas market in ilkeston , says she 's had a lot of `` aggro '' from animal rights campaigners over her decision to include real reindeer .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: latest headlines for derbyshire
text: latest headlines for derbyshire
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: dusky thrush : 'i 've never seen one like this '
text: philip garnett , from bolton , is a keen bird watcher and came down to the centre this morning .
we get a few asian birds every year but not this species .
i 've never seen one .
i 've been to asia about 20 times and have never seen one .
it 's so rare .
i 've seen something like 453 species in britain but i 've never seen one like this . ''
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: dusky thrush 'very very rare '
text: colin higginson , centre manager of dukes barn , said : `` thousands have flocked to the area .
it 's bizarre , i 've never seen anything like it .
`` i have been told it has flown in from asia and probably joined some other thrushes .
i 've been told it 's only been in the country three times so it 's very , very rare . ''
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: fog affecting airport traffic
text: three flights were diverted from east midlands airport to birmingham last night because of the fog .
i 've just spoken to the airport who have confirmed things are just operating a bit slower this morning due to the poor visibility .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: birdwatchers gather to catch glimpse of rare bird
text: flocks of people have showed up at the dukes barn activity centre in the peak district to catch a glimpse of a rare bird called a dusky thrush .
the bird usually breeds eastwards from central siberia but has now been found in derbyshire .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: badminton : team derby beaten
text: team derby suffered their first defeat of the national badminton league season , going down 3-2 at university of nottingham .
derby are still second in the standings .
author: Owen Bradley
BBC Radio Derby Sport

documents.title: stepping stones out of use at dovedale
text: now if you 're a fan of walking , dovedale is the perfect place to go .
but walkers are being asked not to use the attraction 's famous stepping stones to cross the river .
two of the stones have moved from their usual place because of recent bad weather .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: senior police officer 's suicide death 'not deliberate '
text: an inquest has concluded the death of a senior derbyshire police officer was a `` cry for help '' which went wrong .
the body of chief inspector tim frohwein was found in remote countryside near buxton in november 2013 .
coroner robert hunter recorded the death as misadventure .
author: Matthew Barlow
BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: your photos : foggy morning in heanor
text: a foggy start to tuesday morning in heanor .
thank you to stoneyford view for sending in this photo .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: market criticised for using reindeer
text: animal rights activists have criticised the use of reindeer at this weekend 's christmas market in ilkeston .
organisers say the company providing the animals has over ten years experience , the animals will have access to food and water and will be able to move away from the public .
but david otieno , from derby animal rights , said it was cruel to display the animals in this way .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : today 's weather outlook
text: watch : today 's weather outlook

documents.title: oil spillage clear-up begins today
text: work starts this morning to clear an oil spill from the cromford canal near high peak junction .
special booms have been placed in the canal by the environment agency to collect the oil since it was spotted late on thursday .
author: Jonathan Baker
Reporter, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: travel : delays in swarkestone
text: slow traffic on the a514 in both directions in swarkestone between the a5132 barrow lane junction and the b587 junction .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live coverage
text: it 's me with your news , travel , sport and weather for derbyshire and east staffordshire today .
if there 's anything you want to comment on you can email or tweet us .
have a good day !
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live
